UncodeSEO: SEO Analysis Tool for Chrome
Enhance your website's performance with UncodeSEO, a powerful Chrome extension that automatically evaluates the essential SEO aspects of your page. By simply adding the ?uncodeseo parameter to the URL, you receive a detailed score along with a list of recommended improvements.

üîç Key Features:

Header Structure Analysis: Checks for the presence and appropriate number of H1 to H6 tags.
Meta Tags Verification: Assess meta description, title tag, and Open Graph meta tags.
Image Analysis: Detects images without alt attributes to improve accessibility.
Link Analysis: Counts and categorizes internal and external links on the page.
Structured Data: Confirms the presence of structured data (JSON-LD) for better indexing.
Security Check: Verifies if the page is served via HTTPS.
Custom Favicons: Detects whether the favicon is custom or default.
Semantic Structure: Analyzes the presence of semantic tags like <header>, <footer>, <nav>, <main>, and <button> elements.
‚ú® Benefits:

Easy to Use: Simply add ?uncodeseo to the URL to start the analysis.
Instant Results: Get an SEO score and quickly identify areas needing improvement.
Improve SEO and Accessibility: Optimize your site for search engines and enhance user experience.
Free and Efficient: A free tool for developers and website owners looking to boost their SEO.
